value.title: Intro to PowerApps Common Data Service for Canvas Apps
value.excerpt: In this video, you will get an introduction to the Common Data Service (CDS) for Power Apps from a canvas apps perspective. We will create an entity, learn about field types, business rules, relationships, views, build a simple app, and set security on it. Not a be all, end all video but enough to get

value.title: Master advanced techniques for Power Apps canvas apps
value.excerpt: Do you want to make sure your app is the best it can be? This learning path will help you use advanced formulas and perform custom updates. It will also focus on performance checks and testing.

topItems.title: Perform custom updates in a Power Apps canvas app
topItems.excerpt: With some Power Apps canvas apps, a form is not the solution.  This module will focus on how to perform custom updates when your data is not in a form.

value.title: Create a canvas app in Power Apps
value.excerpt: Do you want to create apps to help make your business more efficient? Then, this path is for you. It introduces you to Power Apps, helps you create and customize an app, and then manage and distribute it.

topItems.title: Get started with Power Apps

topItems.title: Customize a canvas app in Power Apps

topItems.title: Manage apps in Power Apps

value.title: Common Data Service Relationships and Lookups with Power Apps canvas apps
value.excerpt: In this video, you will learn how to setup and use Lookup columns in the Common Data Service aka CDS aka Dataflex. We talk about Filter, Patch, Collections, Forms, and more all while helping you build better relationships in your Power Apps Canvas Apps. I also skip all of the "relationship" jokes I wanted

value.title: Use basic formulas to make better Power Apps canvas apps
value.excerpt: Do you want to use formulas to improve functionality and change a behavior in your Power Apps canvas app? This learning path can help you accomplish your goal.

topItems.title: Author a basic formula to change properties in a Power Apps canvas app
topItems.excerpt: Want to enhance your Power Apps canvas app? You can use basic formulas to make changes to control properties.  This will include changing the format, position, simple calculations, and implementing conditional formatting.

value.title: Navigation in a canvas app in Power Apps
value.excerpt: App users can only navigate through the navigation options provided by an app developer, and this module is designed to help you build a good navigation experience for your canvas app.

value.title: Use the UI and controls in a canvas app in Power Apps
value.excerpt: The app user experience often defines the success of your app. This learning path will focus on how to provide the best app navigation, and build the best UI using themes, icons, images, personalization, different form factors, and controls.

topItems.title: Navigation in a canvas app in Power Apps
topItems.excerpt: App users can only navigate through the navigation options provided by an app developer, and this module is designed to help you build a good navigation experience for your canvas app.

topItems.title: How to build the UI in a canvas app in Power Apps
topItems.excerpt: Do you want to build a better UI for app users? This module helps you do that using themes, icons, images, personalization, different form factors, and controls.

topItems.title: Use and understand Controls in a canvas app in Power Apps
topItems.excerpt: Controls help create a better experience for the user and collect the appropriate data. This module will help you understand and use Controls.

value.title: Work with data in a Power Apps canvas app
value.excerpt: Do you need to connect an app to access data? Then this learning path is for you. It will focus on how to connect to data sources. It also will show you how to use filtering, conditions, and other functions to shape your data and write data to your data source.

topItems.title: Work with external data in a Power Apps canvas app
topItems.excerpt: Do you need to connect an app to access data? Then this module is for you. It focuses on connecting your app to a data source.

topItems.title: Shape data in a Power Apps canvas app
topItems.excerpt: When you create a canvas app, do you need to show the user all the data? What if you want to show only the data that is relevant to them? This module will help you address this issue.
